title: Always & Forever
description: With all the obstacles in their path, will things end well for Derek and Julia? Find out in the steamy conclusion to the erotic romance series The Billionaire's Son.The Billionaire's Son 8 : Always & Forever is a ~11,500 word erotic romance which contains explicit depictions of sexual acts and a sexy billionaire playboy behaving badly. This story is intended for an adult audience only!
author: Arabella Quinn
